resources:
Demo1 MainActivity Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer OK Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device. Bulk mode: barcode scanned and saved 放入框中即可进行二维码扫描 Contact info Email address Geographic coordinates Phone number SMS address Plain text preferences_vibrate preferences_play_beep When a barcode is found\u2026 Copy to clipboard 1D barcodes Data Matrix QR Codes Beep Store multiple scans of the same barcode in History Remember duplicates When scanning for barcodes, decode\u2026 Try to retrieve more information about the barcode contents Retrieve more info Vibrate preview pages available,click Download for more. Clear Help About Copy Setting Exit no nfc hardware! nfc disabled nfc enabled Reading Card... No NFC hardware found, Program will NOT work. NFC hardware has been disabled, Please enable it first. (using the \'Setting\' button to turn it on or off) No Card been read, Please take the card near to the back cover of phone and try again Card information has been copied to clipboard ID: PMm: SEL: VER: DAT: USE: Log: Balance: CNY HKD Time(s) Card SN: Book ID: Category: Natural sciences Social sciences Literature Octopus Card (Hong Kong) Shenzhen Tong Shenzhen Tong (Old version) Yangcheng Tong Wuhan City Smart Card Changan Card Beijing Municipal Card Beijing Municipal Card (Old version) Unknown Tag Shenzhen Library (Center) Shenzhen Library (Nanshan) Reader\'s Card Book\'s eTag - -
Make sure that the NFC sensor is enaled before read card. You can click \'setting\' button to open system configure dialog to confirm.
When reading card, please take your card close to NFC sensor of phone (normally, it is at back cover of the phone) and hold a few seconds so that program can read data out.

phone\'s NFC hardware and os performance is not as good as expect currently, so it may need repeatedly read for whese kind of cards. (In case of always fail, You can try to disable NFC sensor and then re-enable it.)

So far we\'ve confirmed the following can be read: ShenzhenTong Card (newer version) of Shenzhen, Octopus Card of Hongkong, Reader Card of Shenzhen Library, Beijing Municipal Card (newer version), Changan Card of Shaanxi,Xi\'an, Wuhan City Smart Card. This is an open source application, welcome everyone participation in development,extends it to read more types of card, Also welcome provide test cards.
- -
 NFCard v

NFCard can read contactless IC card use NFC sensor.
Supporte a range of iso7816-3 / iso15693 / felicia compliant e-wallet / RFID cards, and can be extended to support many specific data protocol, e.g. pboc2.0 of china.
NFCard can read information like balance of account, transaction log, etc. from these cards

This is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. see www.gnu.org/licenses.

Newest version and source code can be found at code.google.com/p/nfcard

By sinpo, 2011.
